title: The Science of Hip Hop with GZA (Part 2)
description: The role of science in hip hop culture is the theme that runs through the conclusion of Neil deGrasse Tyson’s interview with rapper GZA, with hip hop expert Prof. Chris Emdin.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
